properties.areaDesc: Alpena; Grand Traverse; Cheboygan; Antrim; Emmet; Otsego; Charlevoix; Montmorency; Kalkaska; Leelanau; Presque Isle; Beaver Island and surrounding islands; Benzie
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 10:48PM EST until January 11 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Gaylord MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY, a combination of snow
and sleet is expected, with total accumulations of 2 to 5 inches
by mid-morning on Saturday. Mixed precipitation will end by
later Saturday morning, with dry conditions continuing through
Saturday afternoon.

* For the WINTER STORM WATCH, heavy snow will spread north across
the area Saturday night. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8
inches are possible by Sunday morning. Winds gusts as high as
40 mph will result in areas of blowing and drifting snow.

* WHERE...Portions of Northern Lower Michigan.

* WHEN...For the WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY, until 10 AM EST
Saturday. For the WINTER STORM WATCH, from Saturday evening
through Sunday morning.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow
could significantly reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST SATURDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING
